pages.title: Energy Transport
pages.text: To transport energy you may need some Energy Cables, or you can do it without cables but i'll cover that on another page of this book. $(br2) You need to cratf a configurator to configure the cables. With the configurator in hand, just croutch and right click on the tip of the cable, it's very intuitive.

pages.title: Energy Transport
pages.text: Note: You can upgrade the cables by right-clicking with the specific alloy on the cable.
